model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Neighbors A: I just tried this breathing exercise and it really helped me relax.

[MEMORY]
User Description: Neighbors B is a friendly individual who enjoys spending time in the neighborhood. They have a son who recently started high school and are glad that Neighbors A and her son had a fun time at the park. Neighbors B appreciates the thoughtful gestures from Neighbors A, like when they ordered a large cheese pizza with extra sauce for them.

Relationship Description: Neighbors A and Neighbors B have a close friendship, as evidenced by the shared experiences and gestures of appreciation between them. Neighbors A wanted to show appreciation for everything Neighbors B does in the neighborhood, and Neighbors B thanked Neighbors A for the thoughtful gesture.

Event Description: Neighbors A brought Neighbors B a large cheese pizza with extra sauce to show appreciation, and they decided to eat together. They also discussed new adventures and discoveries in the future and enjoyed the ride of life together. Neighbors A and Neighbors B found a park a couple of years ago, played frisbee, and had a picnic, reminiscing about the simpler days.

raw_prediction:
Neighbors A: Yes, I have been back to the park recently. It brings back such good memories of the times we spent there playing games and having picnics. It's always a nice escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life.

Neighbors B: I'm glad to hear that you've been able to enjoy it again. It really is a special place for us. And speaking of good memories, I still remember when you surprised me with that delicious cheese pizza with extra sauce. It was such a thoughtful gesture that I'll always appreciate.

Neighbors A: I'm so glad you enjoyed it! I just wanted to show my gratitude for everything you do in the neighborhood. It's moments like that pizza night that make our friendship even stronger.

Neighbors B: Absolutely, those little gestures mean so much. I'm grateful to have you as a neighbor and friend. And I'm always here for you, whether it's to share a pizza or just to hang out at the park and relax.
